product_name: BELUGA Kayak Carrying Kit - Special Buy
long_description: A simple method to transport your kayak on top of your car, the BELUGA Kayak Carrying Kit uses soft, closed cell foam to cushion and protect your kayak while you drive. The BELUGA Kayak Carrying Kit can be used with or without roof bars. Slight V shape design; 2 straps; mesh storage bag. Special buy.
short_description: A simple method to transport your kayak on top of your car, the BELUGA Kayak Carrying Kit uses soft, closed cell foam to cushion and protect your kayak while you drive.
